name: International Federation of Industrial Energy Consumers
legal: International non profit association of a scientific character
membership: IFIEC World, Alliance of Energy Intensive Industries
goal: IFIEC Europe represents the interests of those industrial sectors for which energy is a significant component of production costs. IFIEC Europe's mission is to anticipate and to respond to the evolving requirements of those sectors by proposing policies that allow realistically priced energy to be available. This will allow them to continue to improve energy efficiency and environmental performance whilst ensuring international competitiveness both in Europe and throughout the world.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Commission Work Programme, Internal Energy Market, Energy and Climate Framework, Energy Union
